transcript:

mere ko sale karne ka hai
Executive: nahi nahi nahi main bata raha hu customer bhi call karega na lead abhi aap
Customer: kya
Customer: hello
Executive: hello main number bata raha hu wo number save kar lena aap ek minute rukiyega
Customer: to main kya karu number leke
Executive: are number save kar lena jab bhi bhi us number se call aayega aapko pata chal jayega ki customer ne call kara hai hamesha ek hi number se call aayega
Customer: to wo call mere ko receive nahi karne ka
Executive: kyu
Customer: to aap mere ko number dega to main kya karu wo number leke us number ko apne phone mein save kar lijiye
Customer: save karu kis naam pe

Executive: ek minute chaho rakho

Customer: 94
Executive: 28

Executive: 40

Executive: 574
Customer: 574 ha isko customer ke name se save kar lena aap theek hai
Customer: ha to ye number leke mere ko kya fayda padega are
Customer: ye baat suno main naya naya hu mere ko samjhao
Executive: ek to dekho jo by lead hota hai na jo aap contact now buyer karte ho aap hai na
Customer: ha jo by lead pe contact now hoga to wo to aap kya kar rahe ho customer se direct approach kar rahe ho ki bhaiya aapne itne product ki inquiry dali hai itne rupay ki quantity itne rupay ka mal hai kab chahiye aapko theek hai
Customer: india india mart ka matlab
Executive: india mart ki aapne lead ha bolo bolo aap india pehle mera sun lo fir aap beech mein bolna jab main khatam kar lu theek hai
Customer: okay okay aap contact now buyer karte ho na contact now buyer to wo ek tarah se dusra ek wo by lead wala business hai theek hai
Customer: ha ab socho mere ko product abhi chahiye 50 rudraksh ki mala chahiye main requirement nahi dalna maine aapko directly call kar liya to konsi lead jaldi convert hogi
Customer: call se call wali hogi na ha call wali hogi na kyuki maine samne se aapko phone kar liya
Customer: ha to lekin wahi ye cheez hai wahi wahi ye cheez hai
Executive: wahi ye cheez maine number save karaya hai customer aapko call abhi kal parso call kiya tha to utha nahi paye aap pata hi nahi chala hoga na aapko aur true caller download mat karna apne phone mein nahi to number block ho jayega theek hai agar true caller hoga phone mein to isko delete kar dena aap
Customer: mera true caller rakha hai true caller hata dena phone se are baap re baap to mere ko dusra number dusra number wo sab aata hai to aap aap aap meul ji usko true caller ko dusre phone mein download kar lena agar true caller download rahega to spam mein chala jayega call automatic disconnect ho jayega aapke pass call ring hi nahi karega
Executive: fir india mart ki team ke pass call chala jayega aur india mart ki team dusre ko lead de degi fir wo
Customer: to true caller hata du true caller hata dena aur kal raat mein aapne phone kiya tha mere ko kal sham mein are bhai yahi yahi janne ke liye mere ko wo jo mil jati hai na to maine phone kiya na to wo wo bolte hai ke mere ko sale karni hai
Executive: kisko aur main dusra kya bolta hu mere ko india main india mart ja ke mere ko samjhao ke mere ko lead konsi dekhni hai mere ko wo samjhao mere ko
Customer: acha acha uske liye na abhi aaj to dekho kya kehte hai meul ji chutti hai to maine dekha ki customer ki call bhi aayi thi aur aapne bhi kal sham ko phone kiya tha to maine to isliye phone kar liya phone maine kiya tha customer ko nahi aaya tha maine kiya tha phone
Executive: nahi nahi aapne mere ko kiya tha phone main ye bol raha hu ha wo sahi baat hai to isliye fir maine phone kiya maine kaha like kuch dikkat wagera ho gayi itni ho gayi hai is wajah se maine phone kiya tha
(music)
Executive: hello ha ji ha ji meul ji chalo theek hai meul ji fir ek bari jo hai na tuesday aram se meeting karte hai theek hai koi dikkat to nahi hai na abhi abhi itna bahut hai mere ko naya naya hu ek baat suno meul ji ek hi bari mein ek din mein 10 din mein kuch nahi hota meul ji main aapko batau na to bhi honest batau aram se ek mahina lag jayega dheere dheere dheere dheere dheere dheere cheeze samjhoge samjhoge aram se ek mahina lagega
Customer: ek jo aapne number diya mere ko abhi abhi jo aapne number diya na mere ko ha ha to maine isko call kiya save karne ke liye is number pe call nahi karna aapko bhaiya are to iska phone aata hai mere pass abhi is number aapko koi bhi buyer phone karega aapko pata chal jayega ye number aapke phone mein save rahega theek hai
Executive: ha theek hai man lo aapko din mein 50 buyer ne phone kara aapko kaise pata chalega yahi number rahega aapka ye yahi number se phone aayega sabka ha ji ha ji isi number pe phone aayega har kisi ka ha to main yahi number save kar deta hu ji abhi jisse baat kar rahe hai ye wala nahi jo maine aapko bataya tha wo wala save karna hai
Customer: nahi nahi nahi nahi kya bolte ho aap
Customer: ye jo 079 0790 ka phone aata hai last mein main batata hu ek minute ruko 07 dobara se number bata raha hu zero main aapko whatsapp kar raha hu is number ko na aapko india mart buyer ke name se save karna hai ek minute ruko 90 90 790 90 790 ka piche ka number hai wo mere ko phone karta hai nahi nahi main dobara se number bata raha hu apne copy pe likh lo pehle copy hai na diary us pe likh lo us pe likh lo india mart 07 aap mere ko whatsapp karo na yaar ek minute ruko aur dusra kya bolta hu mere ko kuch bande sikhaega nahi mere ko ke lead kaise dekhni hai ek minute meul ji ek minute whatsapp number batana aap apna zara 79 79 84 41 8 84411930 hai na 90 9030 bhej diya maine aapko ha isko apne phone mein save karna hai ha buyer ke name se theek hai buyer to yahi se phone aayega mere pass yahi yahi yahi number se phone aayega isi number is number are aapka ye jo number hai na original wala ye 7984 number yahi hai iske upar ye computer wala number laga hua hai jisko hum bolte hai preferred number services pns call is number ko humne hide kar rakha hai taki credit card loan wale aapko call na kar sake directly ki sir loan le lo credit card le lo insurance le lo isliye iske upar number aapka yahi hai 7984419130 iske upar ye 07 number hai na jaise main abhi computer main aapko call kar raha hu mera personal number nahi ja raha 89294 time 521 hai na abhi computer se call ja raha hai jabki main baat apne personal number se kar raha hu main to yahi hai ye computer wala number hai
kuch bhi agar man lo koi dikkat wagera hoti hai to india mart ke pass recording hai kal ko ya aap kisi customer ko galat commitment kar dete ho customer aapke sath fraud kar deta hai to india mart ke pass iska recording rahegi to ye number save kar do isko save kar lo aap ha theek hai koi baat nahi baki aram se tuesday meeting karte hai theek hai aur mere ko mere ko kal samjhao na mere ko ke india kal band hai kal band hai kal band hai meul ji kal band hai parso parso parso pakka pakka pakka ek minute rukna meul ji ek minute aapne kal maine mail kiya tha aapne us pe revert nahi kara mere ko nahi aata ye sab mera friend ko aata hai acha acha acha nahi aapke pass jo gmail hai na gmail ha usko open kijiyega wo mere ko nahi aayega are gmail ka account hoga na aapka gmail ka ha usko open kijiye thoda bahut english aata hoga na thoda bahut to english aata hoga na padhna nahi aata mere ko are sir usme dikhayenge zara gmail account hai na usko open kijiye fir inquiry kaise dekh payenge sir wo to gmail pe hi notification aata hai mere ko ek kam karo aap meri main confuse ho gaya hu main mere ko india mart mein dekh ke aap batao ke mere ko lead konsi dekhni hai mere ko kon mere ko vyapar deta hai wo dekhna sikhao mere ko sir uske regarding main bol raha hu na main aapke sath tuesday meeting karunga aram se computer aur phone ke sath to ek kam karo parso samjhao mera friend ko main phone dunga usko kisko parso mere ko phone karke batana wo phone se main mera friend ko bulaunga wo aapse baat karega mere ko aata nahi hai sab ye to fir ye fir friend use thodi nahi karega friend ke sath to hum baithe the us din first time bhi baithe the ek kam karo main abhi ghar jata hu main se baat karata hu theek hai theek hai main abhi ek mail bhej raha hu aapke email pe email ka matlab to pata hai na sir email address jo gmail hota hai main abhi mail bhej raha hu us pe revert karna hai yes karke theek hai okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads properly.

- Wants to know which leads to focus on.

- Wants to understand IndiaMART better.



Resolution:

- Executive provided a customer service number.

- Executive explained the difference between buyleads and direct calls.

- Executive explained the importance of saving the provided number.

- Executive advised against using Truecaller.

- Executive offered a meeting on Tuesday for detailed explanation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send an email for confirmation.

- Meeting scheduled for Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customer service number, truecaller, meeting
